name: Pool HD —Eight Ball Multiplayer Billiards Game

description:
*** HALF PRICE for a limited time ***
"By far the best pool game I've played"

• Beat your friends in the best pool game for Apple TV!
• Very simple and intuitive controls
• Set in an amazing, cosy pub environment, complete with a fireplace. :)
• Hint for precise aiming
• Smooth and fast paced action

Instructions:
1) Tilt the remote left and right to aim
2) Press the touch surface twice to shoot

Tilt the remote back to get an overview of the table and aim faster.
